Html:
Hi I created an outlook plugin solution via the tools project wizard.
The project was created and it looks to have all of the correct refs and can build.
However I am not sure how to wire it up so that it runs outlook when trying to debug it. I just get the error you cannot run it as it is a class library dll.
I am using VS2015, and I chose outlook automation.

Also all of the tutorials are in german! :(
I need to develop task panes for outlook child windows (email message, task window etc), and with no documentation on this I may need to go back to VSTO.

Project properties -> Debug -> Start external program

(Also make sure Register for COM interop is checkeD)
